name: BLUE CROSS BLUE SHIELD OF MASSACHUSETTS
sampleDescriptions:
H.R. 1625 - Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018 - Issues related to combating the opioid crisis and health insurance marketplace stability. 

H.R. 1301/ P.L. 115-124 - Continuing Resolution of 2018 - Issues related to policies to combat the opioid crisis, Issues related to enhancing Medicare coverage for people with chronic conditions, working for the inclusion of policies focused on mental health and palliative care and the health insurance tax delay. 

S.1334/H.R.2797 - The Patient Choice and Quality Care Act of 2017 - Issues related to better integration of end of life and palliative care into health care coverage. 

HHS regulations focused on insurance market stabilization.

Legislative efforts by Senators Alexander and Murray to support market stabilization. 

Issues related to curbing the abuse of opioids in the United States.

H.R. 1625 - Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018 - Issues related to combating the opioid crisis for Medicare beneficiaries and others. 

H.R. 1301/ P.L. 115-124 - Continuing Resolution of 2018 - Issues related to policies to combat the opioid crisis, Issues related to enhancing Medicare coverage for people with chronic conditions, working for the inclusion of policies focused on mental health and palliative care. 

S.1334/H.R.2797 - The Patient Choice and Quality Care Act of 2017 - Issues related to better integration of end of life and palliative care into health care coverage. 

Issues related to curbing the abuse of opioids in the United States as they relate to entitlement coverage.

H.R. 6 - Support for Patients and Communities Act of 2018 - Issues related to developing and supporting innovative ways to help solve the nation's opioid crisis in the Medicare and Medicaid programs.

S. 3120 - Helping to End Addiction and Lessen Substance Use Disorders Act of 2018 - Issues related to developing and supporting innovative ways to help solve the nation's opioid crisis in the Medicare and Medicaid programs.

S.1334/H.R.2797 - The Patient Choice and Quality Care Act of 2017 - Issues related to better integration of end of life and palliative care into health care coverage. 

HHS regulations focused on the private insurance market.

Legislative efforts to support market stabilization.

Issues related to the reform of 42 CFR Part 2 to ensure better care for people with substance use disorder (SUD). 

Issues related to policies designed to strengthen and stabilize the nation's insurance markets including reinsurance programs, navigator programs, health insurance tax delay and other related issues. 

Issues related to surprise billing and strategies for giving patients more information and peace of mind. 

Issues related to improving treatment options for people with SUD, including the introduction of recovery coaches as part of the health care team.

HHS proposed rules related the treatment of rebates in Medicare Part D.
